      • createPresentation

        public long createPresentation()
        Description copied from class: PresentationModel
        Creates a presentation task on the SIM-TD HMI GUI. The data will only be sent to the HMI bundle once.
        Specified by:
        createPresentation in class PresentationModel
        Returns:
        Presentation ID. If an error occurred, a negative value will be returned.
